external_references.description: Carr, N., Sellmer, S. (2021, June 14). Behind the scenes of business email compromise: Using cross-domain threat data to disrupt a large BEC campaign. Retrieved June 15, 2021.
Microsoft. (2023, February 22). Manage mail flow rules in Exchange Online. Retrieved March 13, 2023.
Pany, D. & Hanley, C. (2023, May 3). Cloudy with a Chance of Bad Logs: Cloud Platform Log Configurations to Consider in Investigations. Retrieved October 16, 2023.

objects.description: On Windows and Exchange systems, monitor for creation or modification of suspicious inbox rules through the use of the `New-InboxRule`, `Set-InboxRule`, `New-TransportRule`, and `Set-TransportRule` PowerShell cmdlets.(Citation: Microsoft BEC Campaign)(Citation: Microsoft Manage Mail Flow Rules 2023)(Citation: Mandiant Cloudy Logs 2023)
